title: Cloud Spark
pageDescription: Kubernetes Spark solution for big data processing.
shortDescription: Spark clusters in Kubernetes for big data processing
metaDescription: Cloud Spark service in VK Cloud: Spark solution for big data processing
markdown: Cloud Spark â€” a solution based on [Apache Spark Operator](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/spark-on-k8s-operator) and [PaaS Kubernetes](/en/base/k8s) from VK Cloud. It allows you to deploy Spark inside Kubernetes using an image from Docker Registry, without using a Hadoop cluster.
